column2: #Districts (rural) are selected on basis of  geographic spread out of the province and ease of implementation .
#Twenty four districts are selected; 14 from Punjab, 14 from Sindh, 3 from KP, 3 from Balochistan, 1 from Gilgit Baltistan, 1 from AJK  and 1 is Islamabad -ICT
mutate(n_districts=case_when( #assign number of units to sample from each region
mutate(region_pop_size=sum(population)) %>% #add in region population size for sampling weights.
region_pop_size=mean(region_pop_size)) %>% #form weights by population size of district to do PPS sampling
#Not add in the non-randomly selected districts  Punjab: Chiniot; Sindh: Sukkur, Karachi
mutate(n_districts=case_when( #assign number of units to sample from each region
mutate(region_pop_size=sum(population)) %>% #add in region population size for sampling weights.
region_pop_size=mean(region_pop_size)) %>% #form weights by population size of district to do PPS sampling

kable(sample_districts, col.names = c("Region", "District", "Number of Districts Selected from Region", "Rural Population Size of District", "Rural Population Size of Region"), caption = 'List of Districts Selected for Samping from Each Region') %>%
